welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jozefow, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the 'Chopin Airport Free WiFi' network and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warsaw Babice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mazury Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
